Sentencas: Three hydrogen electrode-supported, large-scale solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) with different composite air electrodes, namely LSM-YSZ, LSC-GDC, and LSCF-GDC (LSM, LSC, and LSCF cells, respectively), were compared for performance and degradation in the same three cell stack with an H2O/H-2 ratio of 90/10.
Titulo: Comparison of performance and degradation of large-scale solid oxide electrolysis cells in stack with different composite air electrodes

Sentencas: The initial SOEC performance increased in the following order: LSM, LSCF, and LSC.
Titulo: Comparison of performance and degradation of large-scale solid oxide electrolysis cells in stack with different composite air electrodes

Sentencas: The three cells were operated at a constant current density of 0.50 A cm(-2) for 640 h during hydrogen production at 750 degrees C. After the operation, the 10 cm x 10 cm large-scale single cell was divided equally into four subparts from the two diagonal parts with the steam or air inlet area and steam or air outlet area for post-mortem analysis.
Titulo: Comparison of performance and degradation of large-scale solid oxide electrolysis cells in stack with different composite air electrodes

Sentencas: Delamination mainly occurred in the steam and air inlet areas of the LSM and LSC cells, with more severe delamination in the steam inlet area than that in the air inlet area.
Titulo: Comparison of performance and degradation of large-scale solid oxide electrolysis cells in stack with different composite air electrodes

Sentencas: Agglomeration of Ni in the Ni-YSZ hydrogen electrode was observed in the LSM and LSCF cells, whereas honeycomb Ni was observed in the steam and air inlet areas of the LSC cell.
Titulo: Comparison of performance and degradation of large-scale solid oxide electrolysis cells in stack with different composite air electrodes
